channel.title: Functional Vilnius Posts
channel.description: Blog posts and announcements on Functional Vilnius

item.title: Slides from the first meetup, call for speakers
item.description:
Posted on March 1, 2015 by Ignas

Thank you once again to everyone who attended our first meetup – we had a blast!

Here are the slides from the meetup:

  • Functional Programming: facts and myths by Ignas Vyšniauskas
  • FP in Industry by Viačeslav Pozdniakov, Adform

We are looking for speakers for the next meetup, so get in touch if you want to talk about anything FP or type-driven development related.

Finally, if you want to host, sponsor or help with organizing the meetups then we definitely want to hear from you.

P.S. We now also have a LinkedIn group – join us there!

item.title: First meetup announcement
item.description:
Posted on February 4, 2015 by Ignas

We are hyped to announce our first meetup!

It will happen on February 25, 19:00, at Adform offices, who kindly volunteered to host this meeting.

There will be two talks:

  • “Functional Programming: facts and myths” by Ignas Vyšniauskas
  • “FP in Industry” by Viačeslav Pozdniakov, Adform

We also plan to have a small discussion session afterwards to find out about your interests in FP and expectations of future meetups, so be sure to attend and let your opinion be known!

Read the full description and RSVP in the meetup.com event.
